sentence.Network_cn: 你应该剪一剪你的脚趾甲了.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To introduce a simple method for treatment of toenail and paronychia.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的:介绍一种简单的嵌甲及其引起的甲沟炎的治疗方法.

sentence.Network_en: Do not try to cut or dig out the curving toenail.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要试图自己减或者把弯曲的指甲挖出来.

list.abs: 嵌甲 (Ingrown toenail) 是指趾甲的边缘或侧角长到脚趾肉里面。它是一种常见的疾病，会导致疼痛、红肿，有时继发感染。
do not try to cut or dig out the curving toenail .不要试图自己减或者把弯曲的指甲挖出来。
prevalence and predisposing factors of toenail onychomycosis in patients with diabetes mellitus ., 糖尿病患者趾甲真菌病的患病率及易感因素.
Is remedial toenail phlogistic what good method is there ?, 治疗趾甲炎有什么好方法吗?

entry.def: Your toenails are the thin hard areas at the end of each of your toes.

means.word_mean: 1. the nail at the end of a toe

sentences.cn: 你应该剪一剪你的脚趾甲了。

sentences.en: Your toenails are very long,you ought to cut them before they start growing in,or you could be in a lot of pain.
sentences.cn: 你的脚趾甲太长了,应该剪掉,不然趾甲会往里长,给你造成很大的痛苦。
